name: EasyCounting
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: easy counting
des:
Start the skill by saying Alexa, launch easy counting. Alexa will then prompt you to either say a number or just say count with me. If a number was given, Alexa will start counting from that number else Alexa will start from 1.
Once counting has begin, the user will have to say the next number to continue. If Alexa is given the wrong number or a response that is not a number, Alexa will correct the user and tell them what the next number should be. Counting will only continue when the user has said the correct number. Counting with Alexa will only go up to 100 and will terminate when the count has reached 100.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
